column6: SUPERIOR SPIDER-MAN KICKS OFF THE EDGE OF SPIDER-VERSE! - Extra-sized monumental issue, including a story drawn by living legend ADAM KUBERT (ORIGIN 2, AVX)! - How is the Superior Spider-Man still around? Where is he? What is he doing? The road to SPIDER-VERSE STARTS HERE!
column8: | penciller (cover):Giuseppe Camuncoli | writer:Christos Gage | writer:Dan Slott | artist:Adam Kubert
